from rest_framework.authtoken.models import Token


[docs]def authenticate(username):
    users = User.objects.all()
    for user in users:
        if user.username == username:
            token, created = Token.objects.get_or_create(user=user)
            return user.username, token.key
    return None



[docs]class HelloView(APIView):
    permission_classes = (IsAuthenticated,)

[docs]    def get(self, request):
        content = {'message': 'Hello, World!'}
        return Response(content)


[docs]@csrf_exempt
@api_view(["POST"])
@permission_classes((AllowAny,))
def login(request):
    username = request.data.get("username")
    password = request.data.get("password")
    if username is None or password is None:
        return Response({'error': 'Please provide both username and password'},
                        status=HTTP_400_BAD_REQUEST)
    user = authenticate(username=username, password=password)
    if not user:
        return Response({'error': 'Invalid Credentials'},
                        status=HTTP_404_NOT_FOUND)
    token, _ = Token.objects.get_or_create(user=user)
    return Response({'token': token.key},
                    status=HTTP_200_OK)



[docs]@csrf_exempt
@api_view(["GET"])
def sample_api(request):
    data = {'sample_data': 123}
    return Response(data, status=HTTP_200_OK)



[docs]def execsys(ecnum):
    URL = "http://172.20.1.20:8082/users/username/" + ecnum
    # defining a params dict for the parameters to be sent to the API
    PARAMS = {'username': ecnum}
    r = requests.get(url=URL, params=PARAMS)
    data = r.json()
    return data


[docs]def get_center(centre_code):
    centre = centre_code
    if centre == str(50000):
        centre_code = 50000
        centre = "Regional Office (ER)"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(50100):
        centre_code = 50100
        centre = "Eastern Maintenance"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(50200):
        centre_code = 50200
        centre = "Network Development"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(51000):
        centre = "Mutare District"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(51010):
        centre = "Mutare Urban"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(51020):
        centre = "Mutare Environs"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(51030):
        centre = "Mutare Garage"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(52000):
        centre = "Manicaland District"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == (52010):
        centre = "Nyanga"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(52020):
        centre = "Rusape"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(52030):
        centre = "Chipinge"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(52040):
        centre = "Chimanimani"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(52050):
        centre = "Middle Sabi"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(53000):
        centre = "Masvingo District"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(53020):
        centre = "Masvingo Urban"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(53030):
        centre = "Gutu"
    if centre == str(53040):
        centre = "Mashava"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(53050):
        centre = "Rutenga"
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(53060):
        centre = "Chiredzi"
        centre_code = 53060
        return centre, centre_code
    if centre == str(53070):
        centre_code = 53070
        centre = "Masvingo Garage"
        return centre, centre_code
    centre = ""
    centre_code = ""
    return centre, centre_code

[docs]class FilterAsset(View):

[docs]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        transformers = Transformer.objects.all()
        switch = Switchgear.objects.all()
        feeder = Feeder.objects.all()
        submeter = Substationmeter.objects.all()
        pole = Pole.objects.all()
        selected = request.GET['selecta']
        centre_code = request.GET['acenter']
        centre= request.GET['mycenter']
        asset = selected
        # centre, centre_code = get_center(centre_code)
        return render(request, 'beweb/asset.html', {
            'transformers': transformers, 'switch': switch, 'submeter': submeter, 'selected': selected, 'feeder': feeder, 'asset': asset, 'pole': pole, 'centre': centre, 'centre_code': centre_code
        })

[docs]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        print("im here")
        joid = request.GET['joid']
        username = request.user.username
        save_e84(username ,joid)
        asset_id = request.GET['equipment_id']
        asset_name= request.GET['make']
        asset_type= request.GET['asset_type']
        asset_number= request.GET['asset_number']
        asset_serial= request.GET['asset_serial']
        data = {
            "asset_id": asset_id,
            "asset_name": asset_name,
            "asset_type":asset_type,
            "asset_number":asset_number,
            "asset_serial":asset_serial,
        }
        print(joid)
        url = 'http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/jobupdate/' + str(joid)
        username = request.user.username
        usr , tkn = authenticate(username)
        r = requests.patch(url = url , data = data)
        headers = {'Authorization': "Token"+tkn +""}
        print(r.text)
        jobteam = requests.get(url='http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/jobteams' ,)
        
        # jobteam = jobteam.json()
        # work = requests.get(url='http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/workorder' )
        # work = jobteam.json()
        # print(jobteam.text)
        job = Job.objects.filter(job_id = joid)
        # jobs = requests.get(url='http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/jobs' )
        # jobs = jobs.json()
        # print(jobs.text)
        return render(request, 'beweb/reports/mywork.html', {
            'jobteam' : jobteam ,'job':job 
            # ,'work':work
        })

        # return HttpResponse('Data r Saved Sucessfully')

        asset_name= request.form['make']
        asset_type= request.form['asset_type']
        asset_number= request.form['asset_number']
        asset_serial= request.form['asset_serial']
        data = {
            "asset_id": asset_id,
            "asset_name": asset_name,
            "asset_type":asset_type,
            "asset_number":asset_number,
            "asset_serial":asset_serial,
        }
        print(jobid)
        username = request.user.username
        usr , tkn = authenticate(username)
        url = 'http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/jobupdate/' + str(joid)
        headers = {'Authorization': "Token "+tkn+""}
        r = requests.patch(url = url , data = data ,)
        print(r.text)
        return HttpResponse('Data Saved Sucessfully')

    })

[docs]def artisan_team(ecnum):
    leader = ecnum
    teams = Team.objects.all()
    myteam = Team.objects.filter(team_leader=leader)
    # print(teams)
    print(myteam)
    return myteam, teams


[docs]class WorkWizardView(SessionWizardView):
    data = {'subject': '', 'message': 'Hi there',
            'sender': 'invalid email address', 'cc_myself': True}
    f = WorkOrderForm
    form_list = [f, JobForm, TeamForm, assetForm]
    # ([WorkOrderForm, JobForm, TeamForm, assetForm])
    template_name = "beweb/create_wo.html"

[docs]    def get_form_initial(self, step):
        data = {'cent': 'Mutare', 'position': 'SSO'}
        initial = data
        return self.initial_dict.get(step, initial)


[docs]    def done(self, form_list, **kwargs):
        form_data = process_form_data(form_list)
        return render(self.request, 'beweb/done.html', {
            'form_data': [form.cleaned_data for form in form_list],
        })


[docs]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        try:
            return self.render(self.get_form())
        except KeyError:
            return super().get(request, *args, **kwargs)


[docs]def process_form_data(form_list):
    form_data = [form.cleaned_data for form in form_list]
    return form_data

[docs]def home(request):
    """Renders the home page."""
    assert isinstance(request, HttpRequest)
    return render(
        request, 'beweb/index.html', {
            'title': 'Home Page',
            'year': datetime.now().year,
        }
    )


[docs]def wo(request):
    """Renders the E84 page."""
    assert isinstance(request, HttpRequest)
    return render(
        request,
        'beweb/wo.html',
        {
            'title': 'E84 Page',
            'year': datetime.now().year,
        }
    )


[docs]def create(request):
    """Renders the E84 page."""
    data = execsys(request.user.username)
    centre_code = data['centre']
    username = data['username']
    centre, centre_code = get_center(str(centre_code))
    step = 1
    assert isinstance(request, HttpRequest)
    return render(
        request,
        'beweb/workorder/create.html',
        {
            'title': 'Create Work Order', 'centre': centre, 'centre_code': centre_code, 'username': username, 'step': step,
            'year': datetime.now(),
        })


[docs]class Mywo(View):

[docs]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        username = request.user.username
        data = execsys(username)
        centre_code = data['centre']
        username = data['username']
        centre, centre_code = get_center(str(centre_code))
        description = request.GET['description']
        supervisor = request.GET['supervisor']
        centre = request.GET['centre']
        date = request.GET['date']
        centre_code = request.GET['centre_code']
        step = 2
        tl = ""
        myteam, teams = artisan_team(username)
        myteam = ""
        wo = save_wo(username ,description, supervisor, centre, date, centre_code)
        return render(request, 'beweb/job/create.html', {
            'wo': wo, 'step': step, 'centre': centre, 'centre_code': centre_code, 'username': username, 'step': step,
            'year': datetime.now(), 'myteam': myteam, 'tl': tl, 'teams': teams
        })

[docs]class Myjob(View):

[docs]    def get(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        username = request.user.username
        data = execsys(username)
        centre_code = data['centre']
        username = data['username']
        centre, centre_code = get_center(str(centre_code))
        wo = request.GET['wo']
        assignee = request.GET['assignee']
        job_type = request.GET['jobtype']
        description = request.GET['description']
        assignee = request.GET['assignee']
        job_type = request.GET['jobtype']
        description = request.GET['description']
        workflow = request.GET['workflow']
        expected_end_dt = request.GET['expected_end_dt']
        createdby = request.user.username
        username = createdby
        joid = save_jo(createdby,assignee, job_type ,wo,description,workflow ,expected_end_dt)
        jp = job_progress(joid ,createdby)
        save_team(username ,assignee , jp)
        step = 3
        print(centre)
        print(centre_code)
        return render(request, 'beweb/assets/create.html', {
            'joid': joid, 'wo': wo, 'step': step, 'centre': centre, 'centre_code': centre_code, 'username': username, 'step': step,
            'year': datetime.now(),
        })

[docs]    def post(self, request, *args, **kwargs):
        username =  request.user.username
        wo = request.form['wo']
        jobid = request.form['jobid']
        asset_id = request.form['equipment_id']
        asset_name= request.form['make']
        asset_type= request.form['asset_type']
        asset_number= request.form['asset_number']
        asset_serial= request.form['asset_serial']
        data = {
            "asset_id": asset_id,
            "asset_name": asset_name,
            "asset_type":asset_type,
            "asset_number":asset_number,
            "asset_serial":asset_serial,
        }
        print(jobid)
        url = 'http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/jobupdate/' + str(joid)
        usr , tkn = authenticate(username)
        print (tkn)
        headers = {'Authorization': "Token "+tkn+""}
        r = requests.patch(url = url , data = data , headers = headers )
        print(r.text)
        job = Job.objects.filter(job_id = joid)
        return render(request, 'beweb/reports/mywork.html', {
            'job':job
        })

        # return HttpResponse('Data Saved Sucessfully')

[docs]def generate_e84_id():
    e84_id = uuid.uuid4()
    print(e84_id)
    return e84_id


[docs]def save_e84(username,jobid):
    id = generate_e84_id()
    usr , tkn = authenticate(username)
    print (tkn)
    url = "http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/e84linepost"
    headers = {'Authorization': "Token "+tkn+""}
    data = {
        "line_inspection_id": "e8" + str(id) ,
        "pole_number": "",
        "pole_type": "",
        "wayleave": "",
        "comment": "",
        "cross_arm": "",
        "insulator": "",
        "conductors": "",
        "stays": "",
        "earthing": "",
        "cradles": "",
        "anti_climbing_device": "",
        "job": jobid
    }
    r = requests.post(url=url, data=data ,headers=headers)
    response_data = r.json()
    e84_id = response_data["line_inspection_id"]
    print('e84 saved')
    return e84_id


[docs]def generate_job_progress_id():
    jp_id = uuid.uuid4()
    print(jp_id)
    return jp_id


[docs]def job_progress(job_id ,createdby):
    jp_id = generate_job_progress_id()
    usr , tkn = authenticate(createdby)
    print (tkn)
    headers = {'Authorization': "Token "+tkn+""}
    url = "http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/jobprogresspost"
    data = {
        "job_progress_id": "jp" + str(jp_id),
        "created_by": createdby,
        "created_on": datetime.now(),
        "modified_by": "",
        "modified_on": "",
        "start_dt": "",
        "end_dt": "",
        "fleet_no": "",
        "open_mileage": "",
        "close_mileage": "",
        "geom_start": "0101000020E6100000F0FCD160E8063E40F0724F1FCD2C34C0",
        "geom_end": "0101000020E6100000F0FCD160E8063E40F0724F1FCD2C34C0",
        "comments": "",
        "action": "",
        "status": "",
        "job": str(job_id)
    }
    r = requests.post(url=url, data=data , headers=headers)
    response_data = r.json()
    jp_id = response_data['job_progress_id']
    return jp_id


[docs]def generate_job_team_id():
    jt = uuid.uuid4()
    print(jt)
    return jt


[docs]def save_team(username ,assignee , jp_id):
    tl = assignee
    myteam, teams = artisan_team(tl)
    for tm in myteam :
        # id = tm.team_id
        id = generate_job_team_id()
        tl = tm.team_leader
        mb =tm.team_member
        sp = tm.specialisation
        # date = datetime.strptime(expected_end_dt, '%Y-%m-%d')
        usr , tkn = authenticate(username)
        print (tkn)
        url = "http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/jobteampost"
        headers = {'Authorization': "Token "+tkn+""}
       
        data ={
                "job_team_id": id,
                "ec_num": mb,
                "start_dt": datetime.now(),
                "end_dt": "",
                "teamleader": tl,
                "job_progress": jp_id
            }
        r = requests.post(url=url, data=data ,headers=headers)
        response_data = r.json()
        member_id = response_data['ec_num']
    print('Team member assigned job Successfully')


[docs]def create_general():
    createdby = request.user.username
    date_created = datetime.now().date
    return createdby, date_created


[docs]def update_general():
    modified_by = request.user.username
    date_modified = datetime.now().date
    return modified_by, date_modified


[docs]def post_data(url, payload, headers):
    r = requests.request("POST", url, data=payload, headers=headers)
    print(r.text)
    response = r.json()
    return response


[docs]def generate_work_order_id():
    wo = uuid.uuid4()
    return wo


[docs]def save_wo(username,description, supervisor, centre, date, centre_code):
    wo = generate_work_order_id()
    usr , tkn = authenticate(username)
    print (tkn)
    url = 'http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/workorderpost'
    headers = {'Authorization': "Token "+tkn+""}
    data = {
        "work_order_id": "w"+ str(wo),
        "created_by": supervisor,
        "created_on": datetime.now(),
        "modified_by": "",
        "modified_on": "",
        "description": description,
        "centre": centre,
        "comments": "",
        "status": "created"
    }
    r = requests.post(url=url, data=data ,headers=headers )
    response_data = r.json()
    wo = response_data["work_order_id"]
    return wo


[docs]def generate_job_id():
    job_id = uuid.uuid4()
    print(job_id)
    return job_id


[docs]def save_jo(createdby,assignee, job_type ,wo,description,workflow ,expected_end_dt):
    usr , tkn = authenticate(createdby)
    print (tkn)
    jo = generate_job_id()
    url = 'http://172.20.1.20:8087/beapi/jobpost'
    headers = {'Authorization': "Token "+tkn+""}
    data = {
        "job_id": "j" + str(jo),
        "created_by": createdby,
        "created_on": datetime.now(),
        "type": job_type,
        "description": description,
        "assignee": assignee,
        "expected_end_dt": datetime.strptime(expected_end_dt , '%Y-%m-%d'),
        "workflow_id": workflow,
        "work_order": wo
    } 
    r = requests.post(url=url, data=data ,headers=headers )
    response_data = r.json()
    jo = response_data["job_id"]
    return jo


[docs]def contacts(request):
    return HttpResponse('<h1>Contacts page</h1>')


[docs]def create_workorder(request):
    form = WorkOrderForm(request.POST)
    jform = JobForm(request.POST)
    gform = GeneralForm(request.POST)
    if request.method == 'POST':
        if form.is_valid():
            return HttpResponse('<h1>Workorder Created</h1>')
        else:
            jform = JobForm()
            gform = GeneralForm()
            form = WorkOrderForm()
            return render(request, 'beweb/create_wo.html', {'form': form, 'jform': jform, 'gform': gform})
    else:
        form = WorkOrderForm()
        jform = JobForm()
        gform = GeneralForm()
        return render(request, 'beweb/create_wo.html', {'form': form, 'jform': jform, 'gform': gform})


[docs]def new_inspection(request):
        e84Form = E84Lineinspection.objects.all()   
        return render(request,'beweb/e84.html',{'e84Form':e84Form})

[docs]def vteam(request):
       team = Team.objects.all()   
       return render(request,'beweb/view_tm.html',{'team':team})


[docs]def vjob(request):
        team = Team.objects.all() 
        job = Job.objects.all()   
        return render(request,'beweb/view_job.html',{'job':job ,'team':team})


[docs]def get_name(request):
    form = NameForm(request.POST)
    if request.method == 'POST':
        if form.is_valid():
            return HttpResponse('<h1>Name Received</h1>')
        else:
            form = NameForm()
        return render(request, 'beweb/name.html', {'form': form})
    return render(request, 'beweb/name.html', {'form': form})
